about_the_game:
Washed up on the shore of the Isle of Neasied, you must set out to find your father and explore the isle's many mysteries. Wield the Legendary Holy Sword Endu and take flight across an isle of mystery and danger in this retro-inspired Action RPG.

The Story

In an age long past, a brave knight wielding the Holy Sword imprisoned the Evil Immortal Queen Siraatsu on the isle of Neasied in what was supposed to be an eternal slumber. The Great Sage Ikku has had a vision of Queen Siraatsu's re-awakening, and signs of her dark magic are appearing across the land once again. Your father, King Abraon, set out to the Isle of Neasied with a company of knights to once again lay Queen Siraatsu to rest. That was several months ago, and signs of dark magic are ever increasing. Concerned for your father's safety and that of your homeland, you set off for the isle for answers, and to put an end to Queen Siraatsu by your own hand if necessary.

Key Features

  • Explore an interconnected environment filled with secrets hidden everywhere

  • Action-oriented combat with a classic stamina meter, powerful charge attacks, weapon specific special / magic attacks, and secondary throwing weapons

  • Use The Holy Sword Endu to fly across gaps and reach new places. Upgrades allow you to fly further and perform an ultimate attack

  • Discover and equip over 40 melee weapons with a variety of moves and attributes to spice up your combat experience

  • Defeat enemies to gain XP and level up, equip a variety of accessories and eat delicious food to further increase your stats

  • 20+ types of secondary throwing weapons allow for varied strategies in combat

  • Over 100 enemies, mini bosses, and bosses to defeat

content_descriptors.notes: Contains depictions of blood and skeletons

name: Queen's Domain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 quad core, 2.5ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 / AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 quad core, 3.5ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Explore a mysterious island filled with secrets in this combat and traversal focused retro-inspired Action RPG.
